about: A product designer with 8 years of experience building accessible, user-centric interfaces for enterprise SaaS applications. Passionate about design systems and simplifying complex workflows. Dedicated to bridging the gap between design and engineering to deliver polished, high-quality products.

experience.title: Senior Product Designer
experience.subtitle: TechFlow
experience.description: Led the redesign of the core analytics dashboard, increasing user engagement by 40%. Established and maintained the company-wide design system, ensuring consistency across product lines. Mentored junior designers and conducted weekly design critiques.

experience.title: Product Designer
experience.subtitle: Creative Solutions
experience.description: Collaborated with engineering teams to ship 5 major features for the mobile app. Conducted user research and usability testing to validate design decisions. Designed marketing assets and landing pages for product launches resulting in a 15% conversion lift.

experience.title: Junior Designer
experience.subtitle: StartUp Inc.
experience.description: Assisted in the UI design of the initial MVP launch. Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups. Worked closely with the founder to define the brand identity and visual language.

projects.title: E-Commerce Redesign
projects.subtitle: Case Study
projects.description: Complete overhaul of the checkout flow for a major fashion retailer, resulting in a 25% reduction in cart abandonment. Implemented a new design system for scalability.

projects.title: Finance App MVP
projects.subtitle: Mobile Application
projects.description: Designed the 0-to-1 experience for a personal finance tracker. Focused on data visualization and intuitive categorization of expenses.

posts.title: The Future of Product Design in AI

contact.message: I'm currently available for freelance projects and consulting. If you're interested in working together, feel free to reach out.
